mapper.select: select count(*) from BOARDS board where is_deleted = 'N'

select b.board_no as no , c.board_cat_name as catName , u.user_nickname as "user.nickname" , b.board_title as title , b.board_content as content , b.file_name as filename , b.board_created_date as createdDate , b.board_updated_date as updatedDate , b.board_cnt as viewCnt , b.scrap_cnt as scrap , b.board_like as `like` , b.is_deleted as isDeleted , b.is_keep as isKeep , b.is_report as isReport , b.is_hashtag as hashtag from BOARDS b join USERS u on b.user_nickname = u.user_nickname join BOARD_CATEGORIES c on b.board_cat_name = c.board_cat_name where b.is_deleted = 'N' and b.board_no = ${no}

choose.when: row_number() over(order by b.board_created_date desc) rn
row_number() over(order by b.board_like desc) rn
row_number() over(order by b.board_cnt desc) rn
choose.otherwise: row_number() over(order by b.board_no desc) rn
